page.title: 03CROPREDY SCHOOL
page.content: The school is at one end of the village.The canal runs at the bottom of the school field, the railway runs next to the school,the railway bridge runs across the road.The school is in Station Road although there is nolonger any station.Cropredy is a good school it has 4 classrooms,1 staffroom,the headteachers room,a hall and a kitchen. The school dinners are not cooked in the kitchen,they are cooked in another school in Banbury and they are brought out to our school,and to Mollington and Wardington schools, by van.Class 1, the top class are in 1 classroom called "the palace".Classes 2&3 are in 1 very big classroom together,called"the unit" There is one other classroom which was the original school building,but it is now used as a community room.There is a playgroup there on a Tuesday and Thursday and pre-school one afternoon.
